headline: EPAM Systems (EPAM): A Fresh Look at Valuation After Azerbaijan Expansion and Digital Push
summary: EPAM Systems (EPAM) just made waves by announcing its expansion into Azerbaijan, opening a new innovation hub in Baku aimed at advancing the country’s digital services. The move goes well beyond gaining a new address, as EPAM plans to work alongside government agencies to accelerate tech modernization, develop local IT talent, and introduce AI-powered solutions into public services. For investors, this kind of expansion signals the company’s ambition to secure long-term, strategic...
